attributes.action: Remain for another term in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hardest job on the planet. Not perfect but a very long way from where we started. We have moved from the materialistic to a more caring society. Better hospitals, better schools, all sides working together ! We always put ourselves down, UK is great and so are our leaders. Best team on all sides of he house for over 50 years, lets celebrate it.
